titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation appointing the times for His Majesties healing of the disease called the Kings Evill.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Robert Barker, print [sic] to the Kings most excellent Majestie: and by the assignes of John Bill,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end of text: ... Greenwich the first day of Iuly, in the fourteenth yeer of His Majesties reign.
Arms 21 (with 2 leaves under the lion's leg); Steele notation: the fore and.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
